text: Morgan Richard Tsvangirai (; 10 March 1952 – 14 February 2018) was a Zimbabwean politician. He was Prime Minister of Zimbabwe from 2009 to 2013. He was President of the Movement for Democratic Change – Tsvangirai (MDC-T) and a key figure in the opposition to former President Robert Mugabe. ==Death== Tsvangirai died on 14 February 2018 at a hospital in Johannesburg, South Africa from colorectal cancer at the age of 65. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:Prime ministers of Zimbabwe Category:Ambassadors Category:African diplomats
title: Morgan Tsvangirai
